name: Trump's Wall Lite
description:
This is a fun fast fast fast action mini game.

So, Trump says he is going to build a great great wall. But is going to need your help in building it.

You must help Trump to build his wall by defending off those that are up to no good in stealing Trump's bricks.

You must shoot on site anyone you see, for every one you miss will result in them pinching a brick from the wall that will also cost you 1$ for every brick you lose.

The goal is to build 100 bricks high (10 meters) within a given time.

NOTE: This lite version is for iPhone only, full version supports iPad as well as iPhone.
